description:
A minimalist light that can make a big difference keeping you seen. Whether you keep this little light in your seat bag for those rides that last longer than you expected, or you keep it on your bike at all times, the Femto Drive light is small enough to forget and bright enough to glad you have. Each light has 3 modes, a flash, a pulse, and a steady, there is a setting for your conditions. Wide angle lenses provide 180° of visibility, keeping you seen from all sides. And easy, tool-free mounting makes it easy to swap these lights on and off, or between bikes.

  • Modes; steady: 15 lumens (30h), flash 15 lumens (60h), pulse 15 lumens (60h)
  • Easy 1-button interface takes you through all your light’s modes
  • Rugged CNC machined aluminum body
  • Wide-angle lens that provides over 180° of visibility
  • Easy to change coin cell batteries offer impressive runtimes
  • Silicone strap mounts to your bike without tools
  • IPX7 waterproofing protects your light from even the heaviest downpours
name: Lezyne Femto Drive Front Light
